TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ApplicationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组与应用程序相关的标准命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of application related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的命令 以及其他命令库类中的命令（如 和 ）用于表示应用程序程序员经常遇到的一组常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示的实例 ，而不表示命令的实现逻辑。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑使用绑定到命令 。The implementation logic is bound to the command with a . 例如，如果 在控件上执行命令，则执行命令的逻辑 可能不由控件提供，因此，应用程序编写器将负责编写确定控件如何处理命令的逻辑。For example, if the command is executed on a control, the logic which performs the command may not be provided by the control, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the control will handle the command. 许多控件确实为命令库中的许多命令提供实现逻辑。Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，类为 、、、 和 命令提供逻辑。For example, the class provides logic for the , , , , and commands. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅命令 [概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CancelPrint As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ CancelPrint { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取表示“取消打印”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Cancel Print command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示取消打印作业的意图。This command indicates intention to cancel a print job. 任何给定对象上都不一定有该命令的实现;在许多情况下，该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` > ```

summary.span: 获取表示“关闭”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Close command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示 (通常) 文件关闭项的意图。This command indicates intention to close an item (typically a file). 任何给定对象上都不一定有该命令的实现;在许多情况下，该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

summary.span: 获取表示上下文菜单命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Context Menu command.

description.span: 鼠标笔势不会附加到此命令，但大多数应用程序会遵循使用右击笔势调用上下文菜单的约定。

span.span: A Mouse Gesture is not attached to this command, but most applications follow the convention of using the Right Click gesture to invoke the context menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示打开上下文菜单的意图。This command indicates intention to open the context menu. 任何给定对象上都不一定有该命令的实现;在许多情况下，该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示打开更正列表的意图。This command indicates intention to open the correction list. 根据上下文，更正列表有所不同。The correction list is different depending on the context. 例如， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] 在输入中，更正列表标识了汉字重选选项。For example, with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] input the correction list identifies reconversion choices. 任何给定对象上都不一定有该命令的实现;在许多情况下，该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

summary.span: 表示始终被忽略的命令。

span.span: Represents a command which is always ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令始终会被忽略，并且不会处理导致它的输入事件。This command is always ignored and does not handle the input event that caused it. 这提供了一种方法来关闭内置于现有控件中的输入绑定。This provides a way to turn off an input binding built into an existing control. 任何给定对象上都不一定有该命令的实现;在许多情况下，该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an implementation for the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation for the command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
